name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise-cancellation and up to 12 hours of battery life.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Durable, leak-proof stainless steel bottle with 750ml capacity and a sleek design.

name: Smartwatch Fitness Tracker
description: Track your steps, heart rate, and sleep with this stylish and water-resistant smartwatch.

name: USB-C Laptop Charger
description: Fast-charging USB-C charger compatible with most laptops, smartphones, and tablets.

name: 4K Ultra HD Action Camera
description: Capture stunning 4K footage with this waterproof action camera, ideal for adventure seekers.

name: Organic Cotton T-shirt
description: Soft and eco-friendly T-shirt made from 100% organic cotton, available in multiple colors.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Comfortable office chair with adjustable height, lumbar support, and breathable mesh back.

name: Portable Phone Stand
description: Compact and foldable phone stand, perfect for hands-free viewing at any angle.

name: Noise-Cancelling Earbuds
description: Wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and up to 8 hours of playtime on a single charge.

name: Smart LED Light Bulb
description: Control the brightness and color of your lights with this app-controlled, energy-efficient LED bulb.
